channel.title: Posts on Ammar Al-Batool
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ammar Al-Batool

item.title: Hello Internet
item.description: Hello fellow visitor. My name is Ammar Al-Batool. I’m a software engineer who is interested in distributed systems. In this blog, I want to share all stuff related to communication, algorithms and distributed systems. This has been long overdue, but finally arrived. For the past years, I’ve worked at companies that deal with big scale, so I’ve accumulated a fair share of interesting knowledge in this regard. The layout might change, but the content will stay the same.
item.content:
Hello fellow visitor. My name is Ammar Al-Batool. I’m a software engineer who is interested in distributed systems. In this blog, I want to share all stuff related to communication, algorithms and distributed systems. This has been long overdue, but finally arrived.

For the past years, I’ve worked at companies that deal with big scale, so I’ve accumulated a fair share of interesting knowledge in this regard.

The layout might change, but the content will stay the same.
